r;r=document.createElement("link"),r.id=t,r.type="text/css",r.rel="stylesheet",r.href=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectStylesheet=function(e,n,t,o){i(n,t,o,null)},e.prototype.defaultHandler=function(e,n,t,o){window["tinyBasketResult"+e]=window["tinyBasketResult"+e]||{},window["tinyBasketResult"+e][t.toString()]=n},e.prototype.getHandler=function(e,n){return"js"===e?n?this.injectScriptTag:this.injectScript:"css"===e?n?this.injectLinkTag:this.injectStylesheet:this.defaultHandler},e.prototype.skipCacheRequestManager=function(e,n){return class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Festival de Teatro de Curitiba</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon href="http://g1.globo.com/pr/parana/festival-de-teatro-de-curitiba/noticia/fernanda-montenegro-abre-festival-de-curitiba-com-texto-de-nelson-rodrigues.ghtml" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Fernanda Montenegro abre Festival de Curitiba com texto de Nelson Rodrigues </p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Show de Melanie Martinez é eleito o melhor do 2º dia do Lollapalooza 2017 em enquete do G1</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">The Weeknd (2º) e Duran Duran (3º) completaram o pódio no domingo. Strokes pegou quarto lugar; veja a lista completa com o resultado.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="load-more gui-color-primary-bg"><a href="/pop-arte/index/feed/pagina-2.html">Veja mais</a></div><!--!--></div></div></div></div><link id="bstn-external-style" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" data-href="https://s3.glbimg.com/v1/AUTH_51034a7b511149ff823d11cbcd04b2b7/bastian/build/bastian.css"><script>'use strict';(function(b,c,d,e,f,g){function h(){Bastian({"items":[{"age":4118,"content":{"chapeu":{"label":"Rock in Rio 2017","url":"http://g1.globo.com/musica/rock-in-rio/2017/"},"image":{"cropOptions":{},"sizes":{"L":{"height":608,"url":"http://s2.glbimg.com/yN5ZUlxW9Sp6rVL_riDuAwSVgfU=/1080x608/top/smart/https://i.s3.glbimg.com/v1/AUTH_59edd422c0c84a879bd37670ae4f538a/internal_photos/bs/2017/H/B/DOuldXStixGuYHYZx5wQ/alicia-keys.jpg","width":1080},"M":{"height":456,"url":"http://s2.glbimg.com/3WlJo4Nx_zzWy3cU2159pP0XH5c=/810x456/top/smart/https://i.s3.glbimg.com/v1/AUTH_59edd422c0c84a879bd37670ae4f538a/internal_photos/bs/2017/H/B/DOuldXStixGuYHYZx5wQ/alicia-keys.jpg","width":810},"S":{"height":304,"url":"http://s2.glbimg.com/k9qCYNlmVA7HRY_bOrTUHSRjIAM=/540x304/top/smart/https://i.s3.glbimg.com/v1/AUTH_59edd422c0c84a879bd37670ae4f538a/internal_photos/bs/2017/H/B/DOuldXStixGuYHYZx5wQ/alicia-keys.jpg","width":540},"V":{"height":620,"url":"http://s2.glbimg.com/b9BS2RkBHMLtz9eFPcSmlD7wU6Q=/570x620/top/smart/https://i.s3.glbimg.com/v1/AUTH_59edd422c0c84a879bd37670ae4f538a/internal_photos/bs/2017/H/B/DOuldXStixGuYHYZx5wQ/alicia-keys.jpg","width":570}},"url":"https://i.s3.glbimg.com/v1/AUTH_59edd422c0c84a879bd37670ae4f538a/internal_photos/bs/2017/H/B/DOuldXStixGuYHYZx5wQ/alicia-keys.jpg"},"summary":"Alicia Keys canta no dia 17 de setembro, antes de Justin Timberlake; Def Leppard toca no dia 21 e Jota Quest dia 22. <script type="text/javascript">googletag.pubads().addEventListener('slotRenderEnded',function(event){if((event.slot.getTargeting('pos')=="bg")){if(!event.isEmpty){r7adv.has_bg=true;}}});$(function(){postscribe('#r7-skyscraper-sidebar','<script>if ((r7adv.has_bg != true) && r7adv.allowSkyscraper()){ r7ad.printGAds([120, 600],"skyscraper"); }<\/script>');});</script>

<div id="r7-footer-portal-holder">
<div id="r7-footer-cols">
<ul id="r7-sitemap">
<li id="r7-sitemap-noticias" class="r7-cols">
<h3><a href="http://noticias.r7.com/" title="Ir para a página de Notícias">Notícias</a></h3>
<ul>
